title: Auric Goldfinger

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Three times per game during the day, hold a player hostage.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
You can anonymously speak with your hostage at night.
Your hostage will automatically be dealt an unstoppable attack to you unless you choose to refund your ability.

fields.name: Scheme:
fields.value:
**Grand Slam**
Upon Completion, SPECTRE members will gain unlimited charges of their abilities, and everyone who has used up all limited charges will be permanently roleblocked until the last SPECTRE member dies.
